member.name: TF_DISPLAYATTRIBUTE
member.summary: The TF_DISPLAYATTRIBUTE structure contains display attribute data for rendering text.

member.name: TF_DISPLAYATTRIBUTE.crText
member.summary: Contains a structure that defines the text foreground color.

member.name: TF_DISPLAYATTRIBUTE.crBk
member.summary: Contains a TF_DA_COLOR structure that defines the text background color.

member.name: TF_DISPLAYATTRIBUTE.lsStyle
member.summary: Contains a enumeration value that defines the underline style.

member.name: TF_DISPLAYATTRIBUTE.fBoldLine
member.summary: A BOOL value that specifies if the underline should be bold or normal weight. If this value is nonzero, the underline should be bold. If this value is zero, the underline should be normal.

member.name: TF_DISPLAYATTRIBUTE.crLine
member.summary: Contains a TF_DA_COLOR structure that defines the color of the underline.

member.name: TF_DISPLAYATTRIBUTE.bAttr
member.summary: Contains a value that defines text conversion display attribute data.
